Connect your product knowledge to healthcare retailers nationwide, all in one platform

Create, upload & publish courses, all on the front-end
Get Started
  • Educate retailers Erny provides a platform to increase sales through product education and training.
  • Showcase your products Retailers use Erny to discover new products and manage their learning portfolios. Your products are placed in front of relevant retailers everyday.
  • Connect with the people that matter Retailers can connect with you directly with feedback on products and education content. Giving you an avenue to improve the way you do business.

Influence at scale

Retail associates that know your products well are up to 50% more likely to generate a sale. Erny allows you to deliver your message directly to the retailer, so you can influence customer conversions at scale.

Move faster than ever

Erny gives you the tools and infrastructure to rapidly develop new content and deploy it across our network of retailers, to the shop floor, in moments.
How it works

We make it easy

  • Supplier/Brand
  • Retailer/Professional
  • Sign up
    Click the sign up button above and gain access to our database in less than a minute!
  • Set your Profile
    Let us, and the community, know who you are by filling in the profile fields.
  • Start learning
    Go through our courses, start learning or perhaps save them for later
